Name: AdLift Module
Description: AdLift Module General Category Modules Description Electro-active device that 'hijacks' metallic envirosuit fibers to create a 'virtual exoskeleton' that enhances carry capacity. Flavor Text Electro-active shape-memory fibers are highly flexible under normal conditions, but become rigid when exposed to an electric charge. Attributes +15% Weight Capacity Crafting Research Cost 75 25 Crafting Cost 50 10 Prerequisite Patcher II Module

Infobox.Description: Electro-active device that 'hijacks' metallic envirosuit fibers to create a 'virtual exoskeleton' that enhances carry capacity.
Infobox.Flavor Text: Electro-active shape-memory fibers are highly flexible under normal conditions, but become rigid when exposed to an electric charge.
